title: Biden surges arms to Ukraine, fearing Trump will halt U.S. aid
content: Biden’s Ukraine directive has stirred debate, as some officials worry it will cut too deeply into American stockpiles and jeopardize military needs elsewhere.
summary: Biden’s Ukraine directive has stirred debate, as some officials worry it will cut too deeply into American stockpiles and jeopardize military needs elsewhere.

title: Syrian rebels regrouped, seized on weakness of government’s key allies

content: The rebel offensive in Syria started after Israel and Hezbollah agreed to a cease-fire in Lebanon, where conflict has weakened key backers of Syria’s government.
summary: The rebel offensive in Syria started after Israel and Hezbollah agreed to a cease-fire in Lebanon, where conflict has weakened key backers of Syria’s government.

title: U.N. agency suspends aid deliveries from key crossing after convoy attacks
What’s happening in Georgia, and why are thousands protesting?
content: More than 100 were arrested and dozens injured during protests after Georgia’s ruling party said it would suspend talks to join the European Union.
summary: More than 100 were arrested and dozens injured during protests after Georgia’s ruling party said it would suspend talks to join the European Union.

title: Syrian government and rebels both make claims of advances

content: The offensive, led by rebel group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, shifts the front lines of Syria’s civil war. Government forces appeared to withdraw from some areas.

title: What led to Syria’s 13-year civil war, and why has fighting surged again?
content: The sudden assault by Syrian rebels has rapidly redrawn the civil war’s front lines and threatened once again the authority of President Bashar al-Assad.
summary: The sudden assault by Syrian rebels has rapidly redrawn the civil war’s front lines and threatened once again the authority of President Bashar al-Assad.

title: Divided over whether to stop making plastic, U.N. treaty talks collapse
content: Delegates from more than 170 countries huddled for a week of marathon negotiations but came up short on delivering a treaty.

title: Trump win emboldens Israeli settlers seeking control of the West Bank

content: The Africa Initiative is part of an opaque network of groups that Western officials and analysts say the Kremlin uses to spread Russian influence in Africa.

title: Syrian rebels defend gains in Aleppo, push south

title: Trump threatens tariffs on BRICS nations, demanding they use dollar
content: The move comes after Canada’s prime minister rushed to Mar-a-Lago to dine with the president-elect to dissuade him over another big tariff threat.

title: See the scale of destruction in Hezbollah’s stronghold near Beirut
content: Dozens of buildings lie in ruins along the street known as Hadi Nasrallah, a road that cuts through the Beirut suburb of Dahiyeh, a Hezbollah stronghold.
summary: Dozens of buildings lie in ruins along the street known as Hadi Nasrallah, a road that cuts through the Beirut suburb of Dahiyeh, a Hezbollah stronghold.

title: Israeli strikes continue amid cease-fire deal with Hezbollah
content: The IDF said it conducted a strike on military infrastructure sites near the border crossings between Lebanon and Syria, calling it a response to cease-fire violations.

title: IDF strikes aid workers, says one was involved in Oct. 7 attack
